creditline: Gift of Henry White Cannon Jr., Class of 1910, in memory of his Father

makers.displaymaker: Paolo Farinati, 1524–1606; born and died Verona, Italy

texts.textentryhtml: Count Luigi Balladoro (?-?), Verona; Purchased from him by Jean Paul Richter (1847-1937) in Verona in March 1880; Purchased from him by Henry White Cannon (1850-1934) in Florence on March 19, 1906; By descent to his son, Henry (Harry) W. Cannon, Jr. (1887-1966), Class of 1910; Donated to the Museum in 1935.
